    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Description copied from class: Manager
        Called when the world initializes.

        Override to implement custom behavior at initialization.

        Specified by:
        initialize in class Manager

      • createEntityInstance

        protected Entity createEntityInstance()
        Create a new entity.

        New entities will recieve a free ID from a global pool, ensuring every entity has a unique ID. Deleted entities free their ID for new entities.

        Returns:
        a new entity

      • added

        public void added(Entity e)
        Adds the entity to this manager.

        Called by the world when an entity is added.

        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        added in class Manager
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to add

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive(int entityId)
        Check if this entity is active.

        Active means the entity is being actively processed.

        Parameters:
        entityId - the entities id
        Returns:
        true if active, false if not

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled(int entityId)
        Check if the specified entityId is enabled.
        Parameters:
        entityId - the entities id
        Returns:
        true if the entity is enabled, false if it is disabled

      • getActiveEntityCount

        public int getActiveEntityCount()
        Get how many entities are active in this world.
        Returns:
        how many entities are currently active

      • getTotalCreated

        public long getTotalCreated()
        Get how many entities have been created in the world since start.

        Note: A created entity may not have been added to the world, thus created count is always equal or larger than added count.

        Returns:
        how many entities have been created since start

      • getTotalAdded

        public long getTotalAdded()
        Get how many entities have been added to the world since start.
        Returns:
        how many entities have been added

      • getTotalDeleted

        public long getTotalDeleted()
        Get how many entities have been deleted from the world since start.
        Returns:
        how many entities have been deleted since start
